name: Deer Flipper
description:
DEER FLIPPERPlay in Full Screen Mode!Synopsis

Deer Flipper is a top-down pixel art puzzle game! Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019 where the theme is 'only one'. In this case you have only one move... and that is to FLIP!

SO FLIP THAT DEER Controls:
  • Up - W
  • Left - A
  • Down - S
  • Right - D
  • Flip - E
  • Reset - R
Credits:

Art + Programming - Maytch

Audio FX - davekingcool
